body:
Let's not do this. Those script are getting super complicated every day.

What if this whole feature was one or two lines in ci_parameterized_build.sh... just add "bash -c" to the command and you do not have to touch this script.

``` bash
bash -c 'bazel build ... && bazel test -j 1 ...'
```
